contact.getInTouchSubtitle: We're here to help you find your perfect home in Damascus. Reach out to our expert team.
contact.findAnswers: Find answers to common questions about our services
contact.subject: Subject
contact.tellUsHowWeCanHelp: Tell us how we can help...
contact.faq1Question: How quickly will I receive a response?
contact.faq1Answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly at +963 932 498 092.
contact.faq2Question: Do you offer virtual property tours?
contact.faq2Answer: Yes! We offer virtual tours for many of our properties. You can request a virtual tour when contacting us about a specific property.
contact.faq3Question: What documents do I need to rent a property?
contact.faq3Answer: Generally, you'll need a valid ID, proof of income, and references. Our team will provide you with a complete checklist based on your specific situation.
contact.faq4Question: Can I schedule a property viewing on weekends?
contact.faq4Answer: Yes, we offer weekend viewings by appointment. Please contact us to schedule a convenient time.
contact.faq5Question: Do you help with property management?
contact.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive property management services including maintenance, tenant relations, and financial reporting.
contact.faq6Question: What areas in Damascus do you cover?
contact.faq6Answer: We cover all major neighborhoods in Damascus including Old City, Mezzeh, Kafr Sousa, and more. Contact us to inquire about specific areas.
contact.faq7Question: How do I list my property with you?
contact.faq7Answer: You can list your property through our "List Property" page. Our team will verify and help you create an attractive listing.
contact.faq8Question: What payment methods do you accept?
contact.faq8Answer: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, credit cards, and cash. Payment terms are discussed during the booking process.
